name: Blue Angels (itch)
description:
A simple game inspired by kingdom hearts with elements of arena and rpg even though it's a very simple fps where the only objective for now is to survive as long as possible, against 3 different types of enemies in an arena and get a good score, another goal we have is to add a more complete story mode depending on people's opinion of this game.

The game is free but if you want to support the project or help me to continue developing games consider giving a price.
